text: "Real Thing" is a song by English born Australian singer-songwriter Ruel. The song was released on 30 August 2019 as the third single from his second EP, Free Time. == Music video == The music video for "Real Thing" was released on 12 September 2019. It stars Ruel as a robot who is sees another robot get abused and sacrifices himself to save her. ==Critical reception== Tanis Smither from Earmilk says that Ruel seamlessly weaved R&B; and pop together and the song "mounts into an impressive urgency". ==Credits and personnel== Credits adapted from Tidal. * Ruel Vincent van Djik – lead artist, songwriting * Alex Hope – songwriting, guitar * Mark Landon – producer, songwriting * Spencer Stewart – additional production * Kito – additional production * Sean Kantrowitz – guitar * Daniel Walsh – guitar * Nigel Rivers – Bass * Jordan Rose – Drums * Matt Curtin – assistant engineer * Chris Athens – mastering engineer * Eric J.
